merpi_desc: %USER's short canine tail, you probably shouldn't snort it. You could reach out and...

merpi_normal: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail!!
merpi_flowery: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail!!

merpi_normal: %USER softly caresses their short canine tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER softly caresses their short canine tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_repeat: %USER brushes their short canine tail to %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their short canine tail with soft caresses.
merpi_flowery: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their short canine tail with soft caresses.
merpi_repeat: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART into their short canine tail.

merpi_normal: %USER rubs their short canine tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER rubs their short canine tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_repeat: %USER rubs their short canine tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER rubs %TARGET's %T_PART against their short canine tail.
merpi_flowery: %USER rubs %TARGET's %T_PART against their short canine tail.
merpi_repeat: %USER rubs %TARGET's %T_PART against their short canine tail.

merpi_normal: %USER wraps %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail, squeezing comfortably.
merpi_flowery: %USER wraps %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail, squeezing comfortably.
merpi_repeat: %USER wraps their short canine tail around %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail maybe a bit too hard.
merpi_flowery: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail maybe a bit too hard.
merpi_repeat: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail.

merpi_normal: %USER whacks %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail, ow!
merpi_flowery: %USER whacks %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail, ow!
merpi_repeat: %USER smacks %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail!

merpi_normal: %USER is really just choking the shit out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail!
merpi_flowery: %USER is really just choking the shit out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their short canine tail!
